name: Fusion Fighters
description:
The skeletons are attacking! Defeat as many as you can in five minutes while controlling two characters at the same time. When the fusion bar fills up, get the characters close together to perform a fusion and gain a power boost for a short time.

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 with the theme "Stronger Together". There are some remaining bugs that I couldn't quite iron out in time, but I hope you enjoy regardless!
